meanings.definition: Having a new or modern appearance
meanings.sent1: The nowy car gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her nowy dress was the talk of the party.
meanings.sent3: The nowy phone made her old one seem dull.
meanings.sent4: The nowy building stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The nowy painting brought life to the room.

meanings.definition: A heraldic charge representing a diagonal line dividing a field into two colors
meanings.sent1: The shield displayed a nowy design.
meanings.sent2: The nowy symbol was prominent on the flag.
meanings.sent3: The nowy emblem added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent4: The nowy pattern stood out on the banner.
meanings.sent5: The nowy crest symbolized unity and division.

meanings.definition: A type of roof with a gable at each end and a hipped roof in the middle
meanings.sent1: The nowy roof of the house was unique.
meanings.sent2: The nowy structure of the building caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The nowy architecture blended traditional and modern styles.
meanings.sent4: The nowy design of the roof added character to the house.
meanings.sent5: The nowy roofline gave the building a distinctive look.
